amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the appropriation for the Department of Justice General Administration salaries and expenses by $100,000,000 across-the-board.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 96 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce the appropriations made to the Department of Justice General Administration salaries and expenses by $100,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Price (GA) amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 165 - 257 (Roll no. 364).
